effect.scarlet_violet: Lowers all targets’ Attack and Special Attack by one stage. Makes the user switch out.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: With a parting threat, the user lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting.
